column4: I have a quick question for someone.  I am currently using the live cd and I am trying to install 6.10.  I have having issues with installing because the resolution is too low, 640x480.  I have tried to reconfigure the xorg.conf and force at least 1024x768 but everytime i restart the xserver it is still at 640x480.  What else should i try?
when you run the live cd your changes don'T get saved
try using the alternate installed cd , it is txt based
might be a refresh rate issue
